name: Graphics Hacker
description:
NOTICE: The WebGL Version of the Game doesn't work too well with the menu and is only there so my friend can play the game if you are judging please use the downloadable ty <3.

This is a game I made in 6 days for YeegJam 3. You play as a hacker who  hacked the source code of his favorite game so they can edit the graphics. Unfortunately you didn't realize that this messes with the games source code and causes errors.

Have fun :)
